text:
Ant 1.4.1 10/11/2001 build

java version "1.3.1"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.3.1-b24)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.3.1-b24, mixed mode)

cvs 1.11

Defining the port in a CVS command does not change the port number.  I have
moved the port attribute throughout the node to no avail.  Currently it does
support port as a contained element within the cvs element as well.
creator: dunnigan@optonline.net
dunnigan@optonline.net
text:
Bug was in CVS that comes with standard Redhat 7.1.  The port cannot be changed
with this version of CVS.  Solution is to download the latest from cvshome.
